reviews.review: pogchamp

This is one of those games that you play, enjoy, but then check the date of release to realize it is old...
and that makes the enjoyment that much better.

Knowing this game (as of writing) is over a decade old, yet it only feels a few years of dating, makes the superb nature of it that much more splendid. It has fantastic atmosphere (of which even modern games could learn from), excellent usage of the mechanics without ever feeling unreasonable, and a twist of "OH, so THAT'S how you do it" without it ever feeling like the developer's fault that you didn't see it the first time through.

I can thoroughly say that this is among my top games of all time, which is a tad ironic considering most of that collection is old classics, but nonetheless it much deserves its spot.
one of the best games ever
This was an incredible game. It wasn't too hard, but was challenging enough to be really fun. I think everyone should play it.

Ich persöhnlich finde das spiel sehr gut gemacht und würde es auf jeden Fall empehlen. Das einzige Problem allerdings ist aber die kurze Story ich habe das Spiel in nur 5 Stunden durchgespielt. Sonst aber klasse spiel

Quite a short game but it keeps your brain active for a few hours on a free afternoon.. Puzzles aren't too difficult so it's kind of relaxing to play and worth it if you buy the bundle for around £11 like I did. Not played the second one yet but looking forward to it.

Great way to pass the time for puzzle lovin' gamers! This is however, really more like a well dressed, elaborate tutorial for the true puzzle masterpiece called Portal 2. But i HIGHLY recommend that you play this game before getting into its sequel. I'll admit some sections do require some grinding, but the payoff in the end when you combine this game and its sequel experience together, is amazing!

Un jeu solo vraiment fun à jouer, je le recommande aux fans de half life 1 et de la science fiction en général. Le concept est simple mais les possibilités d'énigme sont infinies. Les derniers niveaux sont vraiment hard mais c'est un kif. En fait le seul niveau vraiment hard à part ça c'est celui avec les drones.
Je n'hésiterai pas à en parler à mes proches.

Juego muy corto, de unas 3-4 horas, que merece completamente la pena.

Lo que más me ha gustado es la jugabilidad y los personajes.

Se ha convertido en uno de mis juegos favoritos.

Abi bakıyorumda bu oyunu 2. oyundan sonra oynayıp daha iyi olmasını bekleyenler var. Salak mısınız lan. Hikayeli seriye son oyundan mı başlanır. Evet şahsen  Portal 2' yi daha çok severim ama Portal, Portal 2 ye zemin hazırlayan oyundur. Hikayeyi anlatımı bence 3 yaşındaki bir veledin bile anlayabileceği kadar basit ve GLaDOS' un mizacı ortamı daha iyi hale getiriyor. Oynanış olarak oldukça basit mekanikler tercih edilmiş. Bu basit mekanikler çok zor olmayan bulmacalarla birleştiğinde ortaya çok keyifli bir oynanış çıkmış. Valve' ın ne kadar özgün olduğunun kanıtıdır bence bu oyun.
最后一关玩到崩溃，我是傻逼

Valve just keeps on surprising me, I haven't seen a bad game from them, really..
After finishing the Half-Life series (or what can be played till this very day), I felt like it would be hard to find a game as challenging as the ones before in the Half-Life universe, but this.... It really makes you to think of the ways to finish the stage or get to a specific location, I loved it.

На мой взгляд эта лучшая игра Valve (конечно же после half-life). игра маловата всего на 3 часа, но это были очень насыщенные 3 часа. игра затягивает и хочется узнать продолжение истории.
плюсы: могу отметить что головоломки не скучные, почти в каждой есть секретка, можно повеселится с турелями дурачками.
минусы: слегка устаревшая графика, ОНИ ЗАСТАВИЛИ МЕНЯ УБИТЬ ДРУГА (кто играл тот поймёт)
9 кубов компаньонов из 10

主线简单解谜白给，高级地图稍难有点意思，这游戏真正的开始是最少时间挑战和最少步数挑战
第十六关最少时间金牌卡了3个小时，第十七关最少步数挑战跳蹲按到小指抽筋
打完全金很有成就感，最求硬核的可以试试挑战关

Espectacular:
Un juego con una mecánica bien explotada y un diseño de niveles creativo. 
Una historia simple, pero que funciona perfectamente.
Y como punto adicional, los mods. Que te ayudan a aumentar tu experiencia de juego, a medida  que resuelves nuevos retos y exploras aun más los limites de su mecánica tan característica. 
Recomendado 100%... Y espero que lo disfruten tanto como yo :)

Joguei Portal há 6 anos e resolvi jogar de novo em 2020. É realmente um clássico dos Puzzles. A mecânica é extremamente criativa e inovadora (para a época em que foi desenvolvido), e o jogo não envelhece. Seu único defeito é ser muito curto (problema que não existe em Portal 2). É sensacional aprender a dominar a Portal Gun aos poucos, se divertir com o humor da GLaDOS - uma das personagens mais marcantes dos jogos de computador -, e quebrar a cabeça com os desafios que ficam cada vez mais complicados.
Buen juego, pero le faltan mejores gráficos como más historia porque me lo pase en 5 horas
If you don't know what this is your missing out. Buy it and the second game too. There is no room for regret.
fun

This is an amazing game. You have a portal gun which you use to solve puzzles varying in difficulty, so the impossible becomes easy. This game is a little creepy but IS ONE OF MY FAVOURITE GAMES EVER. I also bought Portal 2 in a bundle and I'm so excited to play it as well. This game was worth every cent, and every second of my life. I enjoyed every single second of it.

Хорошая головоломка с интересным сюжетом и необычным геймплеем. Наша задача заключается в том, чтобы пройти камеру, используя только портальную пушки и свои собственные мозги. Есть как лёгкие, так и не очень уровни, которые заставляют тебя включить прохождение игры на ютубе. 10 кубов-компаньонов из 10!
